wikipedia_page.main: Tom Colverd (born 13 November 1995) is an English cricketer. He played six first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 2016 and 2018.

response: * Tom Colverd (born 1996), born in Tokyo, played first-class cricket for Cambridge MCC UniversityTom Colverd – CricketArchive. Retrieved 7 August 2016.
